amendment.description: Amendments en bloc comprised of amendments numbered 37, 39, 42, 44, 45, 46, 51, 53, 54, 55, 56, 57, 59, 63, 64 and 66 printed in House Report 114-112. See page D542 of the Congressional Record of May 14, 2015 for description of en bloc amendments.
amendment.purpose: An amendment comprised of amendments Nos. 37, 39, 42, 44, 45, 46, 51, 53, 54, 55, 56, 57, 59, 63, 64 and 66 printed in House Report 114-112 offered enbloc.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Thornberry amendments (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A014) offered by Mr. Thornberry.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Thornberry amendments (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendments en bloc (A014) offered by Mr. Thornberry.
